tool_description: Retrieves current cryptocurrency holdings and balances from specified exchanges and wallets.

exchange_apis.description: List of exchange API identifiers to fetch data from

wallet_addresses.description: List of wallet addresses to include in portfolio

error_messages: Exchange API connection failed: Check API credentials and network connectivity for the specified exchanges.
Invalid wallet address format: Ensure wallet addresses are valid for their respective blockchain networks.
Rate limit exceeded: Reduce request frequency or upgrade API plan for the affected exchanges.
usage: Provide exchange_apis array with valid exchange identifiers. Optionally include wallet_addresses and set include_staking flag. Returns complete portfolio holdings across all specified sources.

total_assets.description: Total number of unique assets in portfolio
